event.title: GPU Cycles
event.name: GPU active
event.description: The number of cycles where the GPU has a workload of any type queued for processing.

event.title: GPU Cycles
event.name: Interrupt active
event.description: The number of cycles where the GPU has a pending interrupt.

event.title: GPU Jobs
event.name: Fragment jobs
event.description: The number of jobs processed by the GPU fragment queue.

event.title: GPU Tasks
event.name: Fragment tasks
event.description: The number of 32x32 pixel tasks processed by the GPU fragment queue.

event.title: GPU Cycles
event.name: Fragment queue active
event.description: The number of cycles where work is queued for processing in the GPU fragment queue.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Fragment descriptor reads cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued fragment work is waiting for a descriptor load.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Fragment job issue cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued fragment work is waiting for an available processor.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Fragment job dependency cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued fragment work is waiting for dependent work to complete.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Fragment job finish cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the GPU is waiting for issued fragment work to complete.

event.title: GPU Jobs
event.name: Non-fragment jobs
event.description: The number of jobs processed by the GPU non-fragment queue.

event.title: GPU Tasks
event.name: Non-fragment tasks
event.description: The number of tasks processed by the GPU non-fragment queue.

event.title: GPU Cycles
event.name: Non-fragment queue active
event.description: The number of cycles where work is queued in the GPU non-fragment queue.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Non-fragment descriptor read cycles
event.description: The number number of cycles where queued non-fragment work is waiting for a descriptor load.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Non-fragment job issue cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued non-fragment work is waiting for an available processor.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Non-fragment job dependency cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued non-fragment work is waiting for dependent work to complete.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Non-fragment job finish cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the GPU is waiting for issued non-fragment work to complete.

event.title: GPU Jobs
event.name: Reserved jobs
event.description: The number of jobs processed by the GPU reserved queue.

event.title: GPU Tasks
event.name: Reserved tasks
event.description: The number of tasks processed by the GPU reserved queue.

event.title: GPU Cycles
event.name: Reserved queue active
event.description: The number of cycles where work is queued in the GPU reserved queue.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Reserved descriptor read cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued reserved work is waiting for a descriptor load.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Reserved job issue cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued reserved work is waiting for an available processor.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Reserved job dependency cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where queued reserved work is waiting for dependent work to complete.

event.title: GPU Wait Cycles
event.name: Reserved job finish cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the GPU is waiting for issued reserved work to complete.

event.title: GPU Cycles
event.name: Tiler active
event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler has a workload queued for processing.

event.title: Input Primitives
event.name: Triangle primitives
event.description: The number of input triangle primitives.

event.title: Input Primitives
event.name: Line primitives
event.description: The number of input line primitives.

event.title: Input Primitives
event.name: Point primitives
event.description: The number of input point primitives.

event.title: Visible Primitives
event.name: Front-facing primitives
event.description: The number of front-facing triangles that are visible after culling.

event.title: Visible Primitives
event.name: Back-facing primitives
event.description: The number of back-facing triangles that are visible after culling.

event.title: Primitive Culling
event.name: Visible primitives
event.description: The number of primitives that are visible after culling.

event.title: Primitive Culling
event.name: Facing and XY plane test culled primitives
event.description: The number of primitives that are culled by facing or frustum XY plane tests.

event.title: Primitive Culling
event.name: Z plane test culled primitives
event.description: The number of primitives that are culled by frustum Z plane tests.

event.title: Primitive Culling
event.name: Sample test culled primitives
event.description: The number of primitives culled by the sample coverage test.

event.title: Tiler L2 Accesses
event.name: Read beats
event.description: The number of internal bus data read cycles made by the tiler.

event.title: Tiler L2 Accesses
event.name: Write beats
event.description: The number of internal bus data write cycles made by the tiler.

event.title: Tiler Shading Requests
event.name: Position shading requests
event.description: The number of position shading requests in the IDVS flow.

event.title: Tiler Cycles
event.name: Position shading stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler has a stalled position shading request.

event.title: Tiler Cycles
event.name: Position FIFO full cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler has a stalled position shading buffer.

event.title: Tiler Vertex Cache
event.name: Position cache hits
event.description: The number of position lookups that result in a hit in the vertex cache.

event.title: Tiler Vertex Cache
event.name: Position cache misses
event.description: The number of position lookups that miss in the vertex cache.

event.title: Tiler Cycles
event.name: Primitive assembly busy stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler is stalled waiting for primitive assembly.

event.title: Tiler Vertex Cache
event.name: Varying cache hits
event.description: The number of varying lookups that result in a hit in the vertex cache.

event.title: Tiler Vertex Cache
event.name: Varying cache misses
event.description: The number of varying lookups that miss in the vertex cache.

event.title: Tiler Shading Requests
event.name: Varying shading requests
event.description: The number of varying shading requests in the IDVS flow.

event.title: Tiler Cycles
event.name: Varying shading stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler has a stalled varying shading request.

event.title: Tiler Cycles
event.name: Write buffer transaction stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler write buffer can not send data because it has no available write IDs.

event.title: Tiler Cycles
event.name: Write buffer write stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler write buffer can not send data because the bus is not ready.

event.title: MMU Stage 1 Translations
event.name: MMU lookups
event.description: The number of main MMU address translations performed.

event.title: L2 Cache Requests
event.name: Read requests
event.description: The number of L2 cache read requests from internal masters.

event.title: L2 Cache Stall Cycles
event.name: Read stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles L2 cache read requests from internal masters are stalled.

event.title: L2 Cache Requests
event.name: Write requests
event.description: The number of L2 cache write requests from internal masters.

event.title: L2 Cache Stall Cycles
event.name: Write stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where L2 cache write requests from internal masters are stalled.

event.title: L2 Cache Requests
event.name: Snoop requests
event.description: The number of L2 snoop requests from internal masters.

event.title: L2 Cache Stall Cycles
event.name: Snoop stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where L2 cache snoop requests from internal masters are stalled.

event.title: L2 Cache Requests
event.name: L1 read requests
event.description: The number of L1 cache read requests sent by the L2 cache to an internal master.

event.title: L2 Cache Stall Cycles
event.name: L1 read stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where L1 cache read requests sent by the L2 cache to an internal master are stalled.

event.title: L2 Cache Requests
event.name: L1 write requests
event.description: The number of L1 cache write responses sent by the L2 cache to an internal master.

event.title: L2 Cache Lookups
event.name: Any lookup
event.description: The number of L2 cache lookups performed.

event.title: L2 Cache Lookups
event.name: Read lookup
event.description: The number of L2 cache read lookups performed.

event.title: L2 Cache Lookups
event.name: Write lookup
event.description: The number of L2 cache write lookups performed.

event.title: L2 Cache Lookups
event.name: External snoop lookups
event.description: The number of coherency snoop lookups performed that were triggered by an external master.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: Read transaction
event.description: The number of external read transactions.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: ReadNoSnoop transactions
event.description: The number of external non-coherent read transactions.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: ReadUnique transactions
event.description: The number of external coherent read unique transactions.

event.title: External Bus Beats
event.name: Read beat
event.description: The number of external bus data read cycles.

event.title: External Bus Stalls
event.name: Read stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where a read is stalled waiting for the external bus.

event.title: External Bus Outstanding Reads
event.name: 0-25% outstanding
event.description: The number of read transactions initiated when 0-25% of the maximum are in use.

event.title: External Bus Outstanding Reads
event.name: 25-50% outstanding
event.description: The number of read transactions initiated when 25-50% of the maximum are in use.

event.title: External Bus Outstanding Reads
event.name: 50-75% outstanding
event.description: The number of read transactions initiated when 50-75% of the maximum are in use.

event.title: External Bus Read Latency
event.name: 0-127 cycles
event.description: The number of data beats returned 0-127 cycles after the read request.

event.title: External Bus Read Latency
event.name: 128-191 cycles
event.description: The number of data beats returned 128-191 cycles after the read request.

event.title: External Bus Read Latency
event.name: 192-255 cycles
event.description: The number of data beats returned 192-255 cycles after the read request.

event.title: External Bus Read Latency
event.name: 256-319 cycles
event.description: The number of data beats returned 256-319 cycles after the read request.

event.title: External Bus Read Latency
event.name: 320-383 cycles
event.description: The number of data beats returned 320-383 cycles after the read request.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: Write transaction
event.description: The number of external write transactions.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: WriteNoSnoopFull transactions
event.description: The number of external non-coherent full write transactions.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: WriteNoSnoopPartial transactions
event.description: The number of external non-coherent partial write transactions.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: WriteSnoopFull transactions
event.description: The number of external coherent full write transactions.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: WriteSnoopPartial transactions
event.description: The number of external coherent partial write transactions.

event.title: External Bus Beats
event.name: Write beat
event.description: The number of external bus data write cycles.

event.title: External Bus Stalls
event.name: Write stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where a write is stalled waiting for the external bus.

event.title: External Bus Outstanding Writes
event.name: 0-25% outstanding
event.description: The number of write transactions initiated when 0-25% of the maximum are in use.

event.title: External Bus Outstanding Writes
event.name: 25-50% outstanding
event.description: The number of write transactions initiated when 25-50% of the maximum are in use.

event.title: External Bus Outstanding Writes
event.name: 50-75% outstanding
event.description: The number of write transactions initiated when 50-75% of the maximum are in use.

event.title: External Bus Accesses
event.name: Snoop transactions
event.description: The number of coherency snoops triggered by external masters.

event.title: External Bus Stalls
event.name: Snoop stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where a coherency snoop triggered by external master is stalled.

event.title: Core Cycles
event.name: Fragment active
event.description: The number of cycles where the shader core is processing a fragment workload.

event.title: Core Primitives
event.name: Read primitives
event.description: The number of primitives read from the tile list by the fragment front-end.

event.title: Core Primitives
event.name: Rasterized primitives
event.description: The number of primitives being rasterized.

event.title: Core Cycles
event.name: Fragment FPKB active
event.description: The number of cycles where at least one quad is present in the pre-pipe quad queue.

event.title: Core Warps
event.name: Fragment warps
event.description: The number of fragment warps created.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: Partial rasterized quads
event.description: The number of partially-rasterized fragment quads created.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: Rasterized quads
event.description: The number of quads generated by the rasterization phase.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: Early ZS tested quads
event.description: The number of quads that are undergoing early depth and stencil testing.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: Early ZS updated quads
event.description: The number of quads undergoing early depth and stencil testing, that are capable of updating the framebuffer.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: Early ZS killed quads
event.description: The number of quads killed by early depth and stencil testing.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: Late ZS tested quads
event.description: The number of quads undergoing late depth and stencil testing.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: Late ZS killed quads
event.description: The number of quads killed by late depth and stencil testing.

event.title: Core Warps
event.name: All register warps
event.description: The number of warps that require more than 32 registers.

event.title: Core Tiles
event.name: Tiles
event.description: The number of tiles processed by the shader core.

event.title: Core Tiles
event.name: Constant tiles killed
event.description: The number of tiles killed by transaction elimination.

event.title: Core Quads
event.name: FPK occluder quads
event.description: The number of quads that are valid occluders for hidden surface removal.

event.title: Core Warps
event.name: Full quad warps
event.description: The number of warps that are fully populated with quads.

event.title: Core Cycles
event.name: Non-fragment active
event.description: The number of cycles where the shader core is processing some non-fragment workload.

event.title: Core Tasks
event.name: Non-fragment tasks
event.description: The number of non-fragment tasks issued to the shader core.

event.title: Core Warps
event.name: Non-fragment warps
event.description: The number of non-fragment warps created.

event.title: Core Starvation Cycles
event.name: Non-fragment starvation cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the shader core is processing a non-fragment workload and there are no new threads available for execution.

event.title: Core Cycles
event.name: Execution core active
event.description: The number of cycles where the shader core is processing at least one warp.

event.title: Core PU Instructions
event.name: FMA instructions
event.description: The number of instructions issued to the FMA pipe.

event.title: Core PU Instructions
event.name: CVT instructions
event.description: The number of instructions issued to the CVT pipe.

event.title: Core PU Instructions
event.name: SFU instructions
event.description: The number of instructions issued to the SFU pipe.

event.title: Core PU Instructions
event.name: Message instructions
event.description: The number of instructions issued to the MSG pipe.

event.title: Core EE Instructions
event.name: Diverged instructions
event.description: The number of instructions executed per warp, that have control flow divergence.

event.title: Core PU Instructions
event.name: Instruction cache misses
event.description: The number of instruction cache misses.

event.title: Core Starvation Cycles
event.name: Execution engine starvation cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the processing unit is starved of work.

event.title: Core PU Instructions
event.name: Blend shader calls
event.description: The number of blend shader invocations executed.

event.title: Texture Bus
event.name: Input beats
event.description: The number of texture request message data beats.

event.title: Core Texture Stalls
event.name: Descriptor stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where a quad is stalled on texture descriptor fetch.

event.title: Core Texture Stalls
event.name: Fetch queue stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where a quad is stalled on entering texture fetch because the fetch queue is full.

event.title: Core Texture Stalls
event.name: Filtering unit stall cycles
event.description: The number of cycles where the filtering unit is idle and there is at least one quad present in the texture data fetch queue.

event.title: Core Texture Cycles
event.name: Texturing active
event.description: The number of texture filtering issue cycles.

event.title: Core Texture Cycles
event.name: 4x bilinear filtering active
event.description: The number of cycles where the filtering unit uses the 4x path to implement nearest or bilinear filtering.

event.title: Core Texture Cycles
event.name: 2x trilinear filtering active
event.description: The number of cycles where the filtering unit uses the 4x path to implement trilinear filtering.

event.title: Core Texture Quads
event.name: Texture requests
event.description: The number of quad-width texture operations processed by the texture unit.

event.title: Texture Bus
event.name: Output beats
event.description: The number of texture response message data beats.

event.title: Core Load/Store Cycles
event.name: Full read cycles
event.description: The number of full-width load/store cache reads.

event.title: Core Load/Store Cycles
event.name: Partial read cycles
event.description: The number of partial-width load/store cache reads.

event.title: Core Load/Store Cycles
event.name: Full write cycles
event.description: The number of full-width load/store cache writes.

event.title: Core Load/Store Cycles
event.name: Partial write cycles
event.description: The number of partial-width load/store cache writes.

event.title: Core Load/Store Cycles
event.name: Atomic access cycles
event.description: The number of load/store atomic accesses.

event.title: Core Varying Requests
event.name: Interpolation requests
event.description: The number of warp-width interpolation operations processed by the varying unit.

event.title: Core Varying Cycles
event.name: 32-bit interpolation active
event.description: The number of 32-bit interpolation cycles processed by the varying unit.

event.title: Core Varying Cycles
event.name: 16-bit interpolation active
event.description: The number of 16-bit interpolation cycles processed by the varying unit.

event.title: Core Attribute Requests
event.name: Attribute requests
event.description: The number of instructions executed by the attribute unit.

event.title: Core EE Instructions
event.name: Multiplier instructions
event.description: The number of instructions where the workload uses floating-point multiplier hardware.

event.title: Core L2 Reads
event.name: Fragment L2 read beats
event.description: The number of read beats received by the fixed-function fragment front-end.

event.title: Core L2 Reads
event.name: Fragment external read beats
event.description: The number of read beats received by the fixed-function fragment front-end that required an external memory access due to an L2 cache miss.

event.title: Core L2 Reads
event.name: Load/store L2 read beats
event.description: The number of read beats received by the load/store unit.

event.title: Core L2 Reads
event.name: Load/store external read beats
event.description: The number of read beats received by the load/store unit that required an external memory access due to an L2 cache miss.

event.title: Core L2 Reads
event.name: Texture L2 read beats
event.description: The number of read beats received by the texture unit.

event.title: Core L2 Reads
event.name: Texture external read beats
event.description: The number of read beats received by the texture unit that required an external memory access due to an L2 cache miss.

event.title: Core L2 Reads
event.name: Other L2 read beats
event.description: The number of read beats received by a unit that is not specifically identified.

event.title: Core Writes
event.name: Load/store other write beats
event.description: The number of write beats by the load/store unit that are due to any reason other than writeback.

event.title: Core Writes
event.name: Tile buffer write beats
event.description: The number of write beats sent by the tile buffer writeback unit.

event.title: Core Writes
event.name: Load/store writeback write beats
event.description: The number of write beats by the load/store unit that are due to writeback.
